data: {"page":1,"results":[{"backdrop_path":"/dCRxKa9vpx8DdF1M2rTFu83hPO3.jpg","id":4972,"title":"The Green Butchers","original_title":"De grønne slagtere","overview":"A black comedy featuring two butchers, Svend \"Sweat\" and Bjarne, who start their own shop to get away from their arrogant boss. Cannibalism is soon introduced to the plot, and further complications arise due to the reappearance of Bjarne's intellectually disabled twin brother Eigil.","poster_path":"/w9hCJ0JKftF8nX9Z2gNbVOtCFh1.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"da","genre_ids":[35],"popularity":15.525,"release_date":"2003-03-08","video":false,"vote_average":7.1,"vote_count":266},{"backdrop_path":"/aytZusrwoW5F5s6slH0dm0rYbXw.jpg","id":16204,"title":"The Girl in the Park","original_title":"The Girl in the Park","overview":"A mother, enduringly traumatized by the disappearance of her three-year old daughter 15 years ago, has cut herself off from her ex-husband and son. However, when a troubled young woman with a checkered past enters her life, old psychic wounds painfully resurface, as does the illogical and increasingly irrational hope that the young woman may be the daughter she lost so long ago.","poster_path":"/2BK61BwA9rWjfOtWVbwJtM70IiW.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[18],"popularity":10.749,"release_date":"2007-09-09","video":false,"vote_average":6.013,"vote_count":76},{"backdrop_path":"/1pySFXXpL9qlSgP6A6NL5lsHMeu.jpg","id":11466,"title":"Slim Susie","original_title":"Smala Sussie","overview":"When Erik, a Stockholm urbanite, learns that his beauty-queen sister, Susie, is missing, he goes to their country roots to look for her. But after talking to the eccentric locals -- including a shy video store clerk and a corrupt police officer -- Erik finds a woman who is not at all like the girl he left behind. Award-winning director Ulf Malmros helms this black comedy infused with hipster flair.","poster_path":"/4ND3jFeBkQnKzQLOPxVs30VdPj2.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"sv","genre_ids":[35],"popularity":7.801,"release_date":"2003-10-03","video":false,"vote_average":6.701,"vote_count":72},{"backdrop_path":"/7CqxqdugD9xWsayISLqgJg2ghAK.jpg","id":45261,"title":"(Untitled)","original_title":"(Untitled)","overview":"A fashionable contemporary art gallerist in Chelsea, New York falls for a brooding new music composer in this comic satire of the state of contemporary art.","poster_path":"/2wX8nOKoapiWnSy8CtTXbBbWSvI.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[18,35,10749],"popularity":5.145,"release_date":"2009-10-25","video":false,"vote_average":6.486,"vote_count":36},{"backdrop_path":null,"id":70768,"title":"Sleeping Sickness","original_title":"Schlafkrankheit","overview":"Ebbo and Vera Velten have spent the better part of the past twenty years living in different African countries. Ebbo is the manager of a sleeping sickness programme. His work is fulfilling. Vera, however, feels increasingly lost in Yaounde’s ex-pat community. She can’t bear the separation from her 14-year-old daughter, Helen, who is attending boarding school in Germany. Ebbo must give up his life in Africa or he risks losing the woman he loves. But his fear of returning to a land now remote to him increases with each passing day. Years later. Alex Nzila, a young French doctor of Congolese origin, travels to Cameroon to evaluate a development project. It’s been a long time since he set foot on this continent, but, instead of finding new prospects, he encounters a destructive, lost man. Like a phantom, Ebbo slips away from his evaluator.","poster_path":"/f3ADST5k4qTkAlkJnvyAJ5kPvSN.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"de","genre_ids":[18],"popularity":2.152,"release_date":"2011-06-22","video":false,"vote_average":6.5,"vote_count":14},{"backdrop_path":"/2J78wDQZJIuIWLGYvFkGRgCpSGa.jpg","id":434749,"title":"Holy Sword","original_title":"Son Savaşçı","overview":"After a series of ninja attacks, a Turkish policeman who's an expert on ninjas is called for help.","poster_path":"/oYJsBBwVllSk38u0fj0rOo6ZiWj.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"tr","genre_ids":[12,28],"popularity":1.68,"release_date":"1982-01-01","video":false,"vote_average":6.2,"vote_count":6},{"backdrop_path":"/5IokXOZYTeUhoNyZ2YIg01qrO6P.jpg","id":19126,"title":"Even Money","original_title":"Even Money","overview":"Gambling addiction bring the stories of three otherwise unconnected people together as it destroys each of their lives.","poster_path":"/63SdrM8TZbAi4R1Ju7yiIqBmpY3.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[80,18],"popularity":19.279,"release_date":"2007-03-13","video":false,"vote_average":5.5,"vote_count":65},{"backdrop_path":"/8R4G5HZiQyWXFYLYXpBNFM5F9KH.jpg","id":15819,"title":"We Are the Champions","original_title":"Af banen!","overview":"Divorced father without custody Torben, a former pro soccer player, concentrates on his talented son David's juniors poorly performing team. When the coach suddenly accepts another position, Torben gets his change 'for the time being'. He becomes a substitute father for several of the boys. He's opposed by many parents, but finds love again with one player's single mother. Yet the greatest reward comes from David, in a twisted way.","poster_path":"/gNpixJOfvqOr4oUuBpyauoLbeTU.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"da","genre_ids":[35],"popularity":4.204,"release_date":"2005-03-11","video":false,"vote_average":7.0,"vote_count":10},{"backdrop_path":null,"id":93980,"title":"Election Night","original_title":"Valgaften","overview":"On election night we meet Peter, an idealistic young man, who suddenly discovers he has forgotten to vote. On his way to the polls he encounters a variety of taxi drivers, all racist in their way and Peter has to decide whether to stand up for his convictions or getting to the polls on time. The film won an Oscar for Best Live Action Short Film.","poster_path":"/bYe91VYoNxSEANwYntIwfl3oLdu.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"da","genre_ids":[35],"popularity":4.366,"release_date":"1998-01-01","video":false,"vote_average":7.076,"vote_count":34},{"backdrop_path":"/vsLnGB3KpNOEJaBIHFYK70P6K0q.jpg","id":300522,"title":"Breakdown","original_title":"Defekt","overview":"Gedeon is a young, ambitious detective. Three women have disappeared and he strongly believes that there’s direct connection between them. All three of them were driving lonely and have disappeared in the same region. After a lenghty discussion Gedeon gets the permission from his boss for going on patrol with his colleague in that area.","poster_path":"/8ez1Gy1k90YWEIbAhVi8u6U1GvQ.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"hu","genre_ids":[53,80],"popularity":1.906,"release_date":"1977-12-01","video":false,"vote_average":7.2,"vote_count":4},{"backdrop_path":"/lEiyTTfpYcfMby6GDtXMPxeQIPi.jpg","id":147747,"title":"Wetherby","original_title":"Wetherby","overview":"The mysterious death of an enigmatic young man newly arrived in the suburb of Wetherby releases the long-repressed, dark passions of some of its residents.","poster_path":"/koVPZF3r1jFS1gKMTK27dco6crv.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[18,9648],"popularity":7.57,"release_date":"1985-06-19","video":false,"vote_average":6.029,"vote_count":35},{"backdrop_path":null,"id":157685,"title":"The Expression of Hands","original_title":"Der Ausdruck der Hände","overview":"Historically, the cinema close-up was initially employed to convey emotions through facial expressions. But soon filmmakers also began focusing their attention on hands. Using film extracts, Farocki explores this visual language, its symbolism, Freudian slips, automatisms and its music. Often, hands betray an emotion which the face tries to dissimulate. They can also function as a conduit (exchanging money) or witness to a form of competence (work).","poster_path":"/l6o3h8zbsIMdz8n2REgBAiT0Xdk.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[],"popularity":2.318,"release_date":"1997-09-07","video":false,"vote_average":5.8,"vote_count":5},{"backdrop_path":"/fO3x6euB6hWmGTYfxkqbnD7s7Sw.jpg","id":42791,"title":"The Americanization of Emily","original_title":"The Americanization of Emily","overview":"American sailor Charlie Madison falls for a pretty Englishwoman while trying to avoid a senseless and dangerous D-Day mission concocted by a deranged admiral.","poster_path":"/zA9254usF2X0m0P5CeEXft7uzSe.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[35,18,10749,10752],"popularity":9.846,"release_date":"1964-10-27","video":false,"vote_average":6.7,"vote_count":69},{"backdrop_path":"/3WLO2lBjObxxumWQneUrXJF8u7l.jpg","id":104733,"title":"Excuse Me","original_title":"Undskyld jeg forstyrrer","overview":"A story about the beautiful but confused young woman Helene, who, according to her mother, was born as a 'technical error'. Helene suspects that her father, who left his family before Helene was born, might be the once celebrated director of a dilapidated theater in Copenhagen. Assisted by a series of bizarre coincidences and by her mother's dog (a creature in whose shadow Helene has always lived), Helene manages to get closer to her father.","poster_path":"/rrqsXMa6GOluLsUHIR0qIYC7yQJ.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"da","genre_ids":[18,35,10749],"popularity":4.444,"release_date":"2012-01-05","video":false,"vote_average":5.6,"vote_count":9},{"backdrop_path":"/bDp6VdcKC6JuSqaM86GSD3KPGa3.jpg","id":16767,"title":"Spriggan","original_title":"スプリガン","overview":"An elite superhuman agent must stop a foreign military unit from seizing control of an ancient artifact that holds the key to ultimate power.","poster_path":"/qvub6jsRAMsnCDbO6v4LDkTgoZ7.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"ja","genre_ids":[28,16,878],"popularity":16.84,"release_date":"1998-09-05","video":false,"vote_average":6.109,"vote_count":92},{"backdrop_path":"/amkJr6HP8VeGNDleHmnfnpV10bQ.jpg","id":260202,"title":"Turks \u0026 Caicos","original_title":"Turks \u0026 Caicos","overview":"The second movie in David Hare's Johnny Worricker trilogy. Loose-limbed spy Johnny Worricker, last seen whistleblowing at MI5 in Page Eight, has a new life. He is hiding out in Ray-Bans on the Caribbean islands of the title, eating lobster and calling himself Tom Eliot (he’s a poet at heart). We’re drawn into his world and his predicament when Christopher Walken strolls in as a shadowy American who claims to know Johnny. The encounter forces him into the company of some ambiguous American businessmen who claim to be on the islands for a conference on the global financial crisis. When one of them falls in the sea, their financial PR seems to know more than she's letting on. Worricker soon learns the extent of their shady activities and he must act quickly to survive when links to British prime minister Alec Beasley come to light.","poster_path":"/sbDqSsAhKGybpZk5vGpDRg6cSRx.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[53,18,28,9648],"popularity":19.85,"release_date":"2014-03-20","video":false,"vote_average":6.3,"vote_count":133},{"backdrop_path":"/uLEbGYrppRmiyhCC1ltoSGCv9kC.jpg","id":91690,"title":"The Snows of Kilimanjaro","original_title":"Les Neiges du Kilimandjaro","overview":"A union pensioner and his wife are robbed, but find that merely getting the assailants brought to justice is not enough for their consciences.","poster_path":"/nCqihL2CZ9eNlP8vM5s0ldoNMk1.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"fr","genre_ids":[18],"popularity":8.424,"release_date":"2011-11-16","video":false,"vote_average":6.692,"vote_count":120},{"backdrop_path":"/hvvWpJlIAnUxvmqHO5crATLVNzP.jpg","id":11790,"title":"Peter's Friends","original_title":"Peter's Friends","overview":"After inheriting a large country estate from his late father, Peter invites his friends from college: married couple Roger and Mary, the lonely Maggie, fashionable Sarah, and writer Andrew, who brings his American TV star wife, Carol. Sarah's new boyfriend, Brian, also attends. It has been 10 years since college, and they find their lives are very different.","poster_path":"/gcs7O97E80KRfFd9fNbylnx3YTd.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[35,18],"popularity":13.275,"release_date":"1992-09-18","video":false,"vote_average":6.5,"vote_count":171},{"backdrop_path":"/6tW23q4lZDWL4RWbpRDGEzFMZVm.jpg","id":113655,"title":"Ingenious","original_title":"Lightbulb","overview":"A rags-to-riches story of two friends, a small-time inventor and a sharky salesman, who hit rock bottom before coming up with a gizmo that becomes a worldwide phenomenon.","poster_path":"/arRoYOiE15BAvt4xBvs08onceaP.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[35,18,10749],"popularity":9.543,"release_date":"2009-02-01","video":false,"vote_average":5.6,"vote_count":86},{"backdrop_path":"/fhVSxAgbqsfr6rgRXRD30DfT1cF.jpg","id":56122,"title":"The Gold of Naples","original_title":"L'oro di Napoli","overview":"Tribute to Naples, where director De Sica spent his first years, this is a collection of six Napolitean episodes: a clown exploited by a gangster; an inconstant pizza seller (Sofia) losing her husband's ring; the funeral of a dead child; the gambler Count Prospero B. defeated by a kid; the unexpected and unusual wedding of Teresa, a prostitute; the \"professor\" Ersilio Micci, a \"wisdom seller\".","poster_path":"/dfl8977GCIlKw71zlsTuKBRGu10.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"it","genre_ids":[18,35],"popularity":9.801,"release_date":"1954-12-03","video":false,"vote_average":7.3,"vote_count":117}],"total_pages":2,"total_results":40}
